name: Raider Prototype (PC Lode Runner)
description:
The game is like PC Lode Runner but with a few changes to make it better.

Raider Prototype is about solving how to get all of the treasure and then reaching the top row to complete a level.

At the main menu click on the info button for information about which keys to use.

But if you are in a hurry, use the arrow keys to move plus z or x to zap a block.

The game is free but any donation is much appreciated.
